channel.title: Npc Attacking [help, need ppl with a brain with delta pl0x]

item.title: Npc Attacking [help, need ppl with a brain with delta pl0x]
item.dc:creator: @the1337legend the1337legend
item.description:
@the1337legend wrote:

okkkkkk ive been asking this for awile b.c i cant effin find this out!@!#@@#!@

im using delta and try to make corp beast hit everyone in a general area, here is my code im using right now (works but doesnt hit everyone, just single)

} else if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2705 && misc.random(4)==1) { for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) {//loop so it effects all players client person = (client)p; if(p != null && person.distanceToPoint(EnemyX, EnemyY) <= 20) { plr.specGFX(396); hitDiff = 30 + misc.random(25);} }

if anyone can tell me what’s wrong in this and what to change it would help ALOT, although i ki nda know te problem, im using distance to point whihci believe is the problem seeming it’s not to a point, itin the general area from the beast. as you can see i was trying to make it mean , if player is in enemyx/y 20 spaces , it would get hit a 30, this was the basic copy from heal all spell in lunar, just instead i added the hitDiff and the top part, i leeched ffrom a different code above.

btw this is the npchandler, if yu neded to know
anyone help would be nice

Read full topic
